name: The Last - Mobile
description:
Welcome to a First Person Shooter! Survive as long as you can. Kill enemies and earn money! Choose from 3 different weapons with different stats - Pistol, Rifle  & Sniper!

< Controls >

1. Joystick to move around, touch and drag to look.

2. Click the button with a bullet icon to shoot your weapon.

3. Press the button with a bomb icon to throw a bomb (if you have one).

4. Run over medi-kits to use them. It increases your hp by 20 (works only if you have less than or equals to 80 hp).
